EmailTemplate.name: 201803_EMEAI_GDPR_EmailOpt-in_mih.201803_EMEAI_GDPR_Opt-inEmail3_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Sign Up Before It’s Too Late—Honeywell Aero Innovations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=valued customer}},
We at Honeywell Aerospace are committed to delivering innovations that yield safer, more economical results. Yet, without your participation, you won’t be informed on what we have to offer over our competitors.
Click below and you’re guaranteed to get the latest news on our satellite communications, engines, actuation products, and more. If you do not click, we will no longer email you.
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We’ll continue to keep your information private and secure. We appreciate your trust in the Honeywell brand.
Sincerely,
Adam O'Neill Director of Communications Europe, Middle East, Africa & India Honeywell Aerospace
